verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu lañā nija-gaṇa
guṇḍicā-gṛhera kailā kṣālana, mārjana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā nija-gaṇa—accompanied by His personal associates; guṇḍicā-gṛhera—of the Guṇḍicā temple; kailā—performed; kṣālana—washing; mārjana—cleansing.
translation: Accompanied by His personal associates, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu washed and swept the Guṇḍicā temple, cleansing it as usual.
